title: Microsoft And NetCom Learning Collaborate To Deliver Hands-On Workshops On Power Apps & Power BI
excerpt: Microsoft and NetCom Learning collaborate to offer Power Apps & Power BI workshops. NetCom Learning is proud to collaborate with Microsoft to conduct complimentary 8-Hour virtual instructor-led training workshops on Microsoft Power BI and Microsoft Power Platform.
